mean_cn: v. 使疏远；让渡财产所有权
mean_en: to make (someone) unfriendly :to cause (someone) to stop being friendly, helpful, etc., towards you
word_etyma: ali其他的，改变状态+en表形容词或名词+ate使→把别人当外国人→疏远
short_phrase: She alienates the rest of the group.
sentence: He was alienated by his friends just because he was different.
sentence_trans: 他因为与众不同而被他朋友疏远了。
